snippet.title: Basil Thyme Truck
snippet.description:
* 1.
Basil Thyme Truck
6.8
Moving Target (Check Twitter for current location)
Food Truck • $ $ $ $ • View Menu •
2 tips mention "salmonella"
* Dragonlorde O. • January 23, 2013UPDATE: Ate at Basil Thyme on 14 Jan 13. Came down with Salmonella that evening. Using timeline and type of food posioning, illness traced back to lasagna that I rated fair. BEWARE!!!
People talk about: cannoli, beef lasagna, combo
Save

snippet.title: Tabard Inn
snippet.description:
* 2.
Tabard Inn
9.3
1739 N St. NW (btwn 17th & 18th St. NW)
Hotel • View Menu •
2 tips mention "salmonella"
* Scott H. • May 26, 2013Went for brunch. Waited 45 minutes for our meal (brunch) and they under cooked the chicken. Food service is horrible. If you have a few hours to waste and like salmonella, this is the place for you.
People talk about: one of the best brunch, homemade donuts, doughnuts
Save

* Monique • August 12, 2011Avoid this Johnny Rockets. They are very unsanitary! If you want to avoid food poisoning and salmonella, DO NOT go to this Johnny Rockets.
People talk about: shake, 5 min, cheese fries
